text: Martha Layne Collins (born Martha Layne Hall; December 7, 1936) is a former American businesswoman and politician from Kentucky. As of 2014, she is the only female governor Kentucky has had. She was the fifty-sixth Governor (1983-87) after replacing John Y. Brown Jr.. Collins was considered as a running mate for Democratic Presidential nominee Walter Mondale. Mondale, however, chose Geraldine Ferraro for his mate. Layne Collins was born in Bagdad, Kentucky. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Kentucky Category:Governors of Kentucky Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of Kentucky
title: Martha Layne Collins
